summary: Implemented rich-text blog editing/rendering, footer hash-route handling, and multiple hero effect layers with theme normalization/clamping. Duplicate-review mitigation is added on the frontend (submission guard + UI dedupe), but backend idempotency for retried create-review requests is not evidenced in the diff summary. Several additional UI/admin enhancements (social media, clinics booking URL, editable footer fields, review carousel settings) appear beyond the stated requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the same create-review request is retried (e.g., transient failure + retry), the backend does not create a second record for the same intended submission.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend-side protections (in-flight submission guard and UI deduplication), but does not provide evidence of backend-level idempotency (e.g., a submission id / idempotency key stored/checked in backend/main.mo) to prevent duplicate persisted records on request retry.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded social media management and UI (visibility toggles, icon mapping, enhanced section styling) beyond requested footer quick-link change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a "Blogs" link in Footer Quick Links; no requirement mentioned social media CRUD/UI upgrades.
